name: Awaken (itch) (corliss929)
description:
Awaken is a 2D Puzzle Platformer in which you control golems to navigate 30 levels.

It takes about an hour to play.

Controls

  • left and right arrow keys to move
  • up arrow key to jump
  • R to reset to the beginning of a level
  • down arrow key to control/stop controlling the closest golem
  • Tab to skip to the next level
  • E to skip to the end
